name: Not a Clone (Prototype)
description:
Upon receiving his new smartphone, poor Jimmy downloaded all of the top-selling games that now demands every second of his attention. Help Jimmy play through as many mobile games as possible before the battery runs out!

Created for September 2014's #OneGameAMonth, Not a Clone is a satire on the rampant clones that appears in the mobile game market.

Controls:

Played entirely with the mouse.

This game is made possible by Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/OmiyaGames
